title: Lover`s icon for gifting Rakan/Xayah
body: I gifted my friend Rakan using RP 2 days ago. One of my other friends gifted xayah the same day to another person. They have the icon and I do not i was wondering when I should see it??

replies.body: Wow that must feel like Riot is playing favorites huh? Promise we aren't! The icons are all going to be given out within two weeks of the event ending. Officially the event ends on April 26th, so everyone should have their icons by about May 10th. If you haven't gotten yours by then, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
